bug.author: fepegar
bug.description:
üêõBug When the ghosting algorithm removes the center of k-space, the image is too distorted. To reproduce I'm using <denchmark-link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/3342ndv600tcmjp/t1.nii.gz?dl=1>this image</denchmark-link> and the <denchmark-link:https://torchio.readthedocs.io/slicer.html>TorchIO Slicer module</denchmark-link> . 8 ghosts along axis 2: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85559148-5980a300-b621-11ea-8e1d-3b0d590bff1b.png></denchmark-link>
7 ghosts: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85559190-67362880-b621-11ea-90bc-8ffd59b244f6.png></denchmark-link>
The shape of the image along axis 2 is 176, which is a multiple of 8. Expected behavior An image that looks more like the second. TorchIO version 0.17.0.

comments.comment:
If the zero-frequency component is restored, the image looks more natural, but the artifact is not very visible. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85561186-466ed280-b623-11ea-91a7-04091b342bb8.png></denchmark-link>
Also, there's no reason to limit the intensity kwarg to 1. Maybe the intensity could be scaled to be inversely proportional to the number of ghosts. If number of ghosts is set to 2: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85561599-a2d1f200-b623-11ea-9ec5-a0dac1e28ea0.png></denchmark-link>
This also looks a bit like the original image. Maybe it's better to restore not just the middle line of k-space, but a percentage of the k-space around the center, e.g. 2-5%.
there is already a percentage_to_avoid = 0.05 in the code, no ?

Lastly, I think there's no reason to take only images with positive values. We could use the real part of the inverse Fourier transform instead of the magnitude: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85565186-d2362e00-b626-11ea-8b53-48b77b189a12.png></denchmark-link>
This is the result of using 8 ghosts and getting the real component instead of the magnitude: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12688084/85574282-8ab3a000-b62e-11ea-9b9d-6995748a4a34.png></denchmark-link>
